casebody.data:
State of KANSAS, plaintiff,
v.
State of NEBRASKA and State of Colorado. No. 126, Original. Supreme Court of the United States April 15, 2013.

Motion of Special Master for allowance of fees and disbursements for the period August 24, 2012, through March 7, 2013, granted. The Special Master is awarded a total of $246,328.05 for the period August 24, 2012, through March 7, 2013, to be allocated among the states as follows: Kansas $98,531.22; Nebraska $98,531.22; and Colorado $49,265.61.
